YobbyGobby: I think you should install codecs, and then you will see the video. The two codecs i use:
http://www.xvidmovies.com/codec/
http://ac3filter.net/projects/ac3filter
the second one is not really necessary ithink its just audio codec (and you wrote that the sound is good)

To all of you having problems to see the video: 
It's almost certainly a codec problem, you people need to install the XviD codec.
